ids_info.name: gas_injection
ids_info.description: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves

gas_injection/pipe.documentation: Set of gas injection pipes. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves.

gas_injection/pipe/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes.

gas_injection/pipe/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes.

gas_injection/pipe/species.documentation: Species injected by the pipe (may be more than one in case the valve injects a gas mixture). Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes.

gas_injection/pipe/species/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes. Within species container: Species injected by the pipe (may be more than one in case the valve injects a gas mixture).

gas_injection/pipe/species/element/a.documentation: Mass of atom. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes. Within species container: Species injected by the pipe (may be more than one in case the valve injects a gas mixture). Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

Within species container: Species injected by the pipe (may be more than one in case the valve injects a gas mixture). Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

gas_injection/pipe/exit_position/r.documentation: Major radius. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes. Within exit_position container: Exit position of the pipe in the vaccum vessel.

gas_injection/pipe/exit_position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. gas_injection/pipe/exit_position/z.documentation: Height. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within pipe container: Set of gas injection pipes. Within exit_position container: Exit position of the pipe in the vaccum vessel.

gas_injection/valve/voltage.documentation: Voltage applied to open the valve (raw data used to compute the gas flow rate). Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within valve container: Set of valves connecting a gas bottle to pipes.

gas_injection/valve/response_curve.documentation: Response curve of the valve, i.e. gas flow rate obtained as a function of the applied voltage. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves. Within valve container: Set of valves connecting a gas bottle to pipes.

Within response_curve container: Response curve of the valve, i.e. gas flow rate obtained as a function of the applied voltage.

gas_injection/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves.

gas_injection/time.documentation: Generic time. Within gas_injection IDS: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves.
